page.title: 06 Don`s Store
page.content: The building which is used for the store was built in the c17. Before 1951 it was used as a butchers shop,but had been empty for some years when Don Elderton took it over.In 1968,Don's store also became the village Post Office.Don is busiest just before Christmas.The old people like shopping at Don's because he is friendly,and he will deliver orders.Don says,that his best selling line is cigarettes.Don has lived in the village all his life, and he enjoys the peace and quiet of the village The last real holiday Don had was some years ago when he went away for a long weekend He has been broken into once,when the safe was cut away from the wall.Don has some of his stock delivered,but otherwise he has to collect it himself from the Cash and Carry. The village also has a Coop store just across the road
